thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 72 of 625
thread.title: Christina S.

author: Christina S.
title: Christina S.
text: I love being able to shop online with Fabletics. My favorite parts are the reviews with ratings of how items fit. I have a tough body type to buy for and rarely ever purchase without trying things on, so I find it really useful. I think only one item over the years has not fit properly. My request would be to filter by "fit" since sometimes I want a loose top but other times I need a fitted top.
